title: Rashi on Kiddushin
text: To be within her rights to marry another
1. What is the number in the beginning coming to exclude?- three ways.
2.What is the number in the end coming to exclude?- And she acquires herself back in two ways.

It does not acquire her soul - it is a disgrace to her; therefore the method of chalifin is abolished for her when doing kiddushin. And even with a vessel whose worth is greater than that of a pruta, if you bring it to her with the language of chalifin [it does not acquire her soul] until he brings her according to the laws with the language of acquisition or buying or kiddushin.
